message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $180?
I understand that $200 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $190. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $190 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $170?
I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $185. It's a great price, and I think you'll really get a good deal. Let me know if you're interested!

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll make a counteroffer of $175. Can you sell it to me for that price?
